text: 50 participants would be cool, atm we are around 25 already
does the 50% no-show rate apply here as well?
regarding the number of teams, I do not have any particular wishes

yes, the quick status update should be an Elevator-pitch-like max 1 Minute thing, so that participants could switch teams in case their team is about to dissolve; and stay curious to continue their own project on the 2nd day, and become interested in the final presentation of the other teams at the end
